events.message: I received the wrong item and would like to request a refund because the product is not what I ordered.
The issue has been categorized as a refund request based on the customer's description of receiving the wrong item.
The case was assigned to agent Sarah M. for handling the refund request.
Hello! I understand you received the wrong item. Iâ€™m here to help you with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can proceed with your refund?
Thank you for the quick response. My order number is 12345, and here is a photo showing the wrong product I got instead.
We verified your information. We will initiate a full refund, and you do not need to return the incorrect item. You should see the refund within 5 business days.
I appreciate your prompt assistance and the refund without needing to return the item. This is very convenient, thanks!
The refund process is completed on our side. Please contact us if you do not receive the refund in the stated timeframe.
Just checking in to confirm you have received your refund as expected and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Yes, I got the refund today. Everything is perfect now. Thank you for your excellent support!
The case has been closed following confirmation of refund receipt and customer satisfaction.
A satisfaction survey has been sent to the customer to gather feedback on the support experience.
